divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving home and saw it in the sky ahead of me above the trees, it stayed in place. As I drove toward it in disbelief, it lowered into the trees and disappeared. It looked like a vertical oval shaped orange object that was either glowing or on fire. This was about 12:45 AM in the middle of the night Central time.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Gatesville
There were no other sightings in Gatesville on or around November 30th 2002
This sighting has never been favorited.
